pages.text: Gust Spell Essence contains the concentrated magical properties of wind. Extracted from the Gust Flower Bloom, it embodies the free-flowing and forceful nature of air currents.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: When cast directly, Gust Essence creates a powerful outward burst of wind that pushes entities away from the caster, useful for both defense and environmental manipulation.$(br2)Mana Cost: [value]$(br)Single-use when cast directly

pages.title: Extraction
pages.text: The extraction process requires a Gust Flower Bloom and aerial catalysts to capture and preserve the wind properties during transformation.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: - Direct casting for defensive pushing$(br)- Grafting onto a Living Staff$(br)- Creating wind-powered mechanisms$(br)- As a component in air-based magical items$(br)- Atmospheric manipulation in magical processes
